body:
Cannot build glib.  Recent Spack version. macOS.  Any ideas?

```
Making all in tests
/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/make  all-recursive
Making all in gobject
  GEN      stamp-testmarshal.h
ImportError: No module named site
make[4]: *** [stamp-testmarshal.h] Error 1
make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[2]: *** [all] Error 2
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1985178/spack-build.out.txt)
title: Cannot build glib
